products.name: REBOUND CURL DEFINING CREAM
products.description: A curl-enhancing hair cream that adds definition and light hold to natural curls. Perfect for those with wavy or curly hair. Add this lightweight cream to damp, towel-dried hair and either gently scrunch with your hands before airdrying, or follow with a diffuser.

products.name: CAVALIER HEAVY CLAY
products.description: A volumizing clay that provides our highest level of hold and texture. Tames and conditions thick hair using amino acids and natural oils. Just apply to clean, dry hair to style.

products.name: FIFTH SAMPLE OMADE
products.description: A high-hold, low-shine pomade perfect for slick backs and other polished hairstyles. Its nutrient-rich, water-based formula makes hair softer with every use while still washing out easily. Just apply to clean, dry hair and style as desired.

products.name: TEXTURE WAVES HAIR BUNDLE
products.description: A 4-product bundle perfect for achieving loose, beachy waves. Our best-selling hair oil fights dryness and frizz, while our salt spray and matte paste provide effortless texture and a boost of volume to any hairstyle.
